00039 class JobLogger: private NotCopyable {
00040 public:
00047    class LogScope {
00048    public:
00049       LogScope( JobLogger& log,
00050                 const Packet* packet,
00051                 JobReply& reply ):
00052          m_log( log ),
00053          m_disabled( false ) {
00054          m_log.startLog( packet, reply );
00055       }
00056       ~LogScope() {
00057          if ( ! m_disabled ) {
00058             m_log.endLog();
00059          }
00060 
00061       }
00063       void updateLogProcess() {
00064          m_log.updateLogProcess();
00065       }
00066 
00068       void disable() {
00069          m_disabled = true;
00070       }
00071 
00072    private:
00074       JobLogger& m_log;
00076       bool m_disabled;
00077    };
